alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair; Cambria; Northern Lycoming; Somerset; Sullivan; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 30 at 9:38AM EST until November 30 at 6:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph turning to the west with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Cambria, Blair, Somerset, Bedford, Tioga, Northern Lycoming and Sullivan Counties. * WHEN...Through 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will be on the ridge tops and in the gaps of the ridges. The most likely time for the highest gusts will be when a cold front passes through in the late morning and early afternoon, and for a few hours after.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. For high wind safety information, visit weather.gov/wind. The latest forecast information can be found on the NWS State College Facebook page and Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or on the web at weather.gov/ctp.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Blair; Cambria; Northern Lycoming; Somerset; Sullivan; Tioga
